item.description:
The top 10 mistakes even your tax professional can make!

Joe H. Craft, CPA/PFS, CFP

It's your money!! So no one is going to watch it like you will!!

You don't have to know every detail of how your accountant does your taxes but you know what they say: You don't know what you don't know.

So come and find out!

It may change your investing life!

So, many people have been asking me...What's the deal with notes? What are the pros, what are the cons? Well, I asked my good friend Peg Graveline of Northeast Capital Investments to come in and give you the skinny on notes and why she LOVES them so much.

Then, Joe Craft, my tax guy, who has saved me thousands of dollars in taxes every year for the past 7 years will explain how you too can put more money in YOUR pocket every year!

Thursday, January 17, 2013

5:30 Networking

6:30 Meeting

Crowne Plaza, 320 Washington St., Newtown

free for members; $25 for nonmembers

parking validated

 

 

 

DESIRE. COMMIT. SUCCEED!

Yours in Success!

Bernadette Trafton
item.why: The top 10 mistakes even your tax professional can make!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Boston AREIA Monthly meeting - Taxes w/Joe Craft
